clinical_history: Patient with chest pain and shortness of breath.
findings: Small pneumothorax on the perihilar region side.
Emphysematous changes with hyperlucency in perihilar region.
Pleural effusion on the perihilar region side, moderate in size.
Enlarged lymph nodes in perihilar region, suggestive of lymphadenopathy.
Pulmonary edema with perihilar haze in perihilar region.
recommendations: Clinical correlation advised; refer to pulmonologist.
